title: 785: $200K MANIA PHASE INCOMING FOR BITCOIN!! ADOPTION AND SCARCITY TO FUEL 6-FIGURE BTC RUN: BLOOMBERG!!
description:
A popular crypto analyst is saying that Bitcoin is due for a steep rally to the six-figure level as BTC follows a widely-known pattern.

“That would mean over the next month or two, we would expect a move back up toward the $50,000 to $60,000 to form our first floor. And this could potentially lead us to into a final mania phase all the way up to the $200,000 level.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
